name: mockyeah-docs
description: Documentation for a powerful service mocking, recording, and playback utility.

scripts.docs:publish: yarn build && git checkout f1d15fb && mkdir -p _book/archive/0.16 && gitbook build . _book/archive/0.16 && cp CNAME _book/CNAME && gh-pages -d _book && git checkout -

author: Ryan Ricard
